about.title: Cover letter
about.desc: Web development is my vocation; there is constant drive and ambition to learn new technologies engage with new teams to gain and share knowledge. My main field of expertise is frontend development; my stack is react/ redux, bundling with Webpack and styling through SASS or JSS, also used JEST for testing. Additionally, I have hands-on backend experience mainly with PHP/ MYSQL but I have also used Mongo, Redis and Nodejs. In terms of infrastructure, I am familiar with Git, Teamcity, Jenkins, Jira and many more. I thoroughly enjoy team building activities and tasks, easy to communicate with, adaptable to new teams and highly productive, never hesitant to go the extra mile.
